snippet.title: SWARMCADE - New Arcade Survivors-like Out Now on Steam
snippet.description:
Can you survive the relentless swarm? In this arcade take on the 'Bullet Heaven'/Survivors-like action roguelite, you'll slay 1000s of foes, level up, loot chests and try to make your character more powerful than ever. Spend gold to unlock perma-upgrades and additional heroes, so you can beat the odds on future runs.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2146490/Swarmcade/
